CustomField.formula: If( Not ( IsNull ( First_Check__c )) && Not ( IsNull ( Client_Information_Received_Payroll__c )), (First_Check__c - Client_Information_Received_Payroll__c - 2*( floor((First_Check__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Client_Information_Received_Payroll__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))), If(ISNULL(First_Check__c), (today() - Client_Information_Received_Payroll__c - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Client_Information_Received_Payroll__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))), Null))
CustomField.label: NCS Onboarding timeframe
